EmailTemplate.subject: Article: “Contactless” Is the New Comfort Now
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This year, restaurant operators had no choice but to develop creative strategies to meet changing consumer demands.
Delivery. Curbside service. Disposable menus. And now contactless.
But what does “contactless” really mean?
It means allowing guests to see the menu, order, pay and tip—without ever touching a menu, bill folio or pen, like how NCR Mobile Pay lets users scan a code with their phone to safely pay.
Read what it means for your guest—and employee—experience in this article. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> P.S. There are a lot of touchpoints to consider for contactless. But we can help (quickly, too).
